main event: A bright light was observed moving at a high rate of speed in Huntington, Indiana, on September 30, 1961.
interesting points: The light was described as appearing like the tail of a meteor or comet,The sighting lasted for 15 minutes before the light disappeared behind trees,Previous UFO sightings in the area, like the one referenced from December 1928, were checked and linked to the planet Venus,The report classified the sighting as insufficient data but suggested it was probably a balloon or celestial object.
